description:
A slicing software for light-curing 3D printers, independently developed by Creality.

Halot Box is a slicing software for light-curing 3D printers, independently developed by Creality. It is an easy-to-operate software that provides various model processing functions for free. It can help you remotely control and monitor your 3D printer, and assist you in printing directly from your computer.
V4.6.1.4101 Software Update Notes:

1. Added support for HALOT-X1 printer model.

2. Implemented features for HALOT-X1 (Zone Exposure Preview).

3. Introduced One-Click Print function (Beta).

4. Added Creality Cloud parameter package export feature.

5. Optimized slicing export speed âš¡.

6. Reduced sliced file size (for HALOT-X1).

7. Enhanced support handling experience.

8. Improved UX with:

- Streamlined operation logic.

- Revamped parameter package selector.

- More flexible parameter package creation.

9. Fixed known bugs.
